title: Adam Morgan from Hopesfall
itunes:title: Adam Morgan from Hopesfall
description:
North Carolina represent! Adam Morgan, the drummer of Hopesfall, is on the show this week to discuss the "secular" music scene, collecting vinyl and big budget records (aka I confirm/deny the story of "The Satellite Years" costing 20k to record). It was a delightful conversation and I am happy to bring it to you. Use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order at Rockabilia. Incredible company and infinite choices. Pre-order all of the cool Agnostic Front stuff that Bridge Nine has up now. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
